name: API Connection Issues
description: Tests failed due to network or API connectivity problems

name: HTTP Status Code Failures
description: Tests failed due to unexpected HTTP status codes

name: JSON Response Issues
description: Tests failed due to JSON parsing or structure problems

name: Data Validation Failures
description: Tests failed due to data validation issues

name: Test Infrastructure Issues
description: Tests failed due to test setup or infrastructure problems

name: Negative Test Cases
description: Expected failures from negative test scenarios
